trans-unit.source: Services must implement this method and return true only if the service objects being compared may be used interchangeably by the client. Services are free to return the same object reference to an underlying service if that, but clients must not depend on equality of reference.
trans-unit.target: 服务必须实现此方法，并且仅当所比较的服务对象可以由客户端互换使用时，才返回 true 。服务可以自由地将相同的对象引用返回给基础服务，但是客户端不能依赖于引用的相等性。

trans-unit.source: Services must implement this method and return true only if the service objects being compared may be used interchangeably by the client. Services are free to return the same object reference to an underlying service if that, but clients must not depend on equality of reference.
trans-unit.target: 服务必须实现这个方法,并且只有当被比较的服务对象可以被客户端互换使用时才返回true。如果这样的话,服务可以自由地返回对底层服务的相同对象引用,但客户机必须不依赖于引用的平等性。

trans-unit.source: Services returned from this method may be installed on PrinterJob instances which support print services. Calling this method is equivalent to calling StreamPrintServiceFactory.lookupStreamPrintServiceFactories() and specifying a Pageable DocFlavor.
trans-unit.target: 从此方法返回的服务可以安装在支持打印服务的 PrinterJob 实例上。调用此方法等效于调用 StreamPrintServiceFactory.lookupStreamPrintServiceFactories() 并指定一个Pageable DocFlavor。

trans-unit.source: Services which are registered by registerService(PrintService) will not be included in lookup results if a security manager is installed and its checkPrintJobAccess() method denies access.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了安全管理器并且其 checkPrintJobAccess() 方法拒绝访问，则由 registerService(PrintService) 注册的服务将不包含在查找结果中。

trans-unit.source: Services which are registered by registerService(PrintService) will not be included in lookup results if a security manager is installed and its checkPrintJobAccess() method denies access.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了安全管理器,并且它的checkPrintJobAccess()方法拒绝访问,那么通过registerService(PrintService)注册的服务将不会包含在查找结果中。

trans-unit.source: Session contexts may not contain all sessions. For example, stateless sessions are not stored in the session context.
trans-unit.target: 会话上下文可能不包含所有会话。例如,无状态会话不存储在会话上下文中。

trans-unit.source: Sessions can be set to expire after a specified time limit.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置会话在指定的时间限制后过期。

trans-unit.source: Sessions may be explicitly invalidated. Invalidation may also be done implicitly, when faced with certain kinds of errors.
trans-unit.target: 会话可以被显式无效化。当遇到某些类型的错误时,也可以隐式地进行无效化。

trans-unit.source: Set a hint the size of the underlying buffers used by the platform for incoming network I/O.

trans-unit.source: Set a hint the size of the underlying buffers used by the platform for incoming network I/O. When used in set, this is a suggestion to the kernel from the application about the size of buffers to use for the data to be received over the socket. When used in get, this must return the size of the buffer actually used by the platform when receiving in data on this socket. Valid for all sockets: SocketImpl, DatagramSocketImpl
trans-unit.target: 设置一个提示平台用于接收网络I/O的底层缓冲区的大小。当在set中使用时,这是应用程序对内核关于通过socket接收数据时使用的缓冲区大小的建议。当用于get时,必须返回平台在这个套接字上接收数据时实际使用的缓冲区大小。对所有套接字有效。SocketImpl,DatagramSocketImpl。

trans-unit.source: Set a hint the size of the underlying buffers used by the platform for outgoing network I/O.
trans-unit.target: 设置平台用于外发网络I/O的底层缓冲区的大小提示。

trans-unit.source: Set a hint the size of the underlying buffers used by the platform for outgoing network I/O. When used in set, this is a suggestion to the kernel from the application about the size of buffers to use for the data to be sent over the socket. When used in get, this must return the size of the buffer actually used by the platform when sending out data on this socket. Valid for all sockets: SocketImpl, DatagramSocketImpl
trans-unit.target: 设置一个提示平台用于外发网络I/O的基础缓冲区的大小。当在set中使用时,这是应用程序对内核关于通过socket发送数据时使用的缓冲区大小的建议。当用于get时,必须返回平台在该套接字上发送数据时实际使用的缓冲区大小。对所有套接字有效。SocketImpl,DatagramSocketImpl。

trans-unit.source: Set the accessible flag for this object to the indicated boolean value. A value of true indicates that the reflected object should suppress Java language access checking when it is used. A value of false indicates that the reflected object should enforce Java language access checks.
trans-unit.target: 将此对象的 accessible 标志设置为指示的布尔值。值为 true 表示反射的对象在使用时应禁止Java语言访问检查。值为 false 表示所反射的对象应强制执行Java语言访问检查。

trans-unit.source: Set the accessible flag for this reflected object to true if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，将此反射对象的 accessible 标志设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Set the accessible flag for this reflected object to true if possible. This method sets the accessible flag, as if by invoking setAccessible(true), and returns the possibly-updated value for the accessible flag. If access cannot be enabled, i.e. the checks or Java language access control cannot be suppressed, this method returns false (as opposed to setAccessible(true) throwing InaccessibleObjectException when it fails).
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，将此反射对象的 accessible 标志设置为 true 。该方法设置 accessible 标志，就像调用 setAccessible(true) 一样，并返回 accessible 标志的可能更新的值。如果无法启用访问，即无法取消检查或Java语言访问控制，则此方法返回 false （与 setAccessible(true) 失败时抛出 InaccessibleObjectException 相反）。

trans-unit.source: Set the accessible flag for this reflected object to the indicated boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 将此反射对象的 accessible 标志设置为指示的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Set the accessible flag for this reflected object to the indicated boolean value. A value of true indicates that the reflected object should suppress checks for Java language access control when it is used. A value of false indicates that the reflected object should enforce checks for Java language access control when it is used, with the variation noted in the class description.
trans-unit.target: 将此反射对象的 accessible 标志设置为指示的布尔值。值为 true 表示使用该反射对象时，应禁止检查Java语言访问控制。值为 false 表示所反射的对象在使用时应强制执行Java语言访问控制检查，并在类描述中进行说明。

trans-unit.source: Set the activation system for the VM.
trans-unit.target: 为虚拟机设置激活系统。

trans-unit.source: Set the activation system for the VM. The activation system can only be set it if no group is currently active. If the activation system is not set via this call, then the getSystem method attempts to obtain a reference to the ActivationSystem by looking up the name "java.rmi.activation.ActivationSystem" in the Activator's registry. By default, the port number used to look up the activation system is defined by ActivationSystem.SYSTEM_PORT. This port can be overridden by setting the property java.rmi.activation.port.
trans-unit.target: 设置虚拟机的激活系统。仅当当前没有组处于活动状态时，才可以设置激活系统。如果未通过此调用设置激活系统，则 getSystem 方法尝试通过在激活程序的注册表中查找名称“ java.rmi.activation.ActivationSystem”来获取对 ActivationSystem 的引用。默认情况下，用于查找激活系统的端口号由 ActivationSystem.SYSTEM_PORT 定义。可以通过设置属性 java.rmi.activation.port 来覆盖此端口。

trans-unit.source: Set the current caret visual location. This can be used when moving between lines that have uneven end positions (such as when caret up or down actions occur). If text flows left-to-right or right-to-left the x-coordinate will indicate the desired navigation location for vertical movement. If the text flow is top-to-bottom, the y-coordinate will indicate the desired navigation location for horizontal movement.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前的尾随位置。当在末端位置不均的行之间移动时(例如当发生上、下插字动作时),可以使用这个位置。如果文字从左到右或从右到左流动,x坐标将指示垂直移动的理想导航位置。如果文字从上到下流动,y坐标将表示水平移动的理想导航位置。

trans-unit.target: 设置当前在流中的标记位置。ByteArrayInputStream对象在构造时默认标记在零位置。通过本方法可以将它们标记在缓冲区的另一个位置。

trans-unit.source: Set the estimatedMajorSpan property that determines if the major span should be treated as being estimated.

trans-unit.source: Set the estimatedMajorSpan property that determines if the major span should be treated as being estimated. If this property is true, the value of setSize along the major axis will change the requirements along the major axis and incremental changes will be ignored until all of the children have been updated (which will cause the property to automatically be set to false). If the property is false the value of the majorSpan will be considered to be accurate and incremental changes will be added into the total as they are calculated.
trans-unit.target: 设置 estimatedMajorSpan 属性,该属性决定是否应将主跨度视为估计值。如果此属性为真,则沿主要轴的 setSize 的值将改变沿主要轴的要求,并且增量变化将被忽略,直到所有的子代都被更新(这将导致该属性自动设置为 false)。如果该属性为假,则majorSpan的值将被认为是准确的,增量变化将在计算时被添加到总数中。

trans-unit.source: Set the global socket factory from which RMI gets sockets (if the remote object is not associated with a specific client and/or server socket factory). The RMI socket factory can only be set once. Note: The RMISocketFactory may only be set if the current security manager allows setting a socket factory; if disallowed, a SecurityException will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 设置全局套接字工厂,RMI从该工厂获取套接字(如果远程对象没有与特定的客户端和/或服务器套接字工厂关联)。RMI 套接字工厂只能设置一次。注意:只有当当前的安全管理器允许设置套接字工厂时,才可以设置RMISocketFactory;如果不允许,将抛出SecurityException。

trans-unit.source: Set the grouping size.
trans-unit.target: 设置分组大小。

trans-unit.source: Set the grouping size. Grouping size is the number of digits between grouping separators in the integer portion of a number. For example, in the number "123,456.78", the grouping size is 3.
trans-unit.target: 设置分组大小。分组大小是指数字的整数部分中分组分隔符之间的位数。例如,在数字 "123,456.78 "中,分组大小为3。

trans-unit.source: Set the grouping size. Grouping size is the number of digits between grouping separators in the integer portion of a number. For example, in the number "123,456.78", the grouping size is 3. Grouping size of zero designates that grouping is not used, which provides the same formatting as if calling setGroupingUsed(false).
trans-unit.target: 设置分组大小。分组大小是数字整数部分中分组分隔符之间的位数。例如，在数字“ 123,456.78”中，分组大小为3。分组大小为零表示未使用分组，这提供了与调用 setGroupingUsed(false) 相同的格式。

However, in many cases the encoding of the input stream is already resolved, as in the case of reading XML from a StringReader.

trans-unit.source: Set the pre-link transformer.

trans-unit.source: Set the pre-link transformer. This is a GuardedInvocationTransformer that will get the final chance to modify the guarded invocation after it has been created by a component linker and before the dynamic linker links it into the call site. It is normally used to adapt the return value type of the invocation to the type of the call site. When not set explicitly, a default pre-link transformer will be used that simply calls GuardedInvocation.asType(LinkerServices, MethodType). Customized pre-link transformers are rarely needed; they are mostly used as a building block for implementing advanced techniques such as code deoptimization strategies.
trans-unit.target: 设置预链接变压器。这是一个 GuardedInvocationTransformer ，它将在组件链接器创建了受保护的调用之后，并且在动态链接器将其链接到调用站点之前，有最后的机会来修改受保护的调用。它通常用于使调用的返回值类型适合于呼叫站点的类型。如果未明确设置，则将使用默认的预链接转换器，该转换器仅调用 GuardedInvocation.asType(LinkerServices, MethodType) 。很少需要定制的预链接变压器。它们通常用作实现高级技术（例如代码反优化策略）的构建块。

trans-unit.source: Set the selected item. The implementation of this method should notify all registered ListDataListeners that the contents have changed.
trans-unit.target: 设置所选项目。此方法的实现应通知所有已注册的 ListDataListener 内容已更改。

trans-unit.source: Set the sequence number.
trans-unit.target: 设置序列号。

trans-unit.source: Set the serialization filter for the stream.
trans-unit.target: 设置流的序列化过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Set the serialization filter for the stream. The filter's checkInput method is called for each class and reference in the stream. The filter can check any or all of the class, the array length, the number of references, the depth of the graph, and the size of the input stream. The depth is the number of nested readObject calls starting with the reading of the root of the graph being deserialized and the current object being deserialized. The number of references is the cumulative number of objects and references to objects already read from the stream including the current object being read. The filter is invoked only when reading objects from the stream and for not primitives.
trans-unit.target: 设置流的序列化过滤器。流中的每个类和引用都将调用过滤器的 checkInput 方法。过滤器可以检查任何或所有类，数组长度，引用数，图的深度以及输入流的大小。深度是从读取要反序列化的图的根和要反序列化的当前对象开始的嵌套readObject调用的数量。引用数是对象和对已从流中读取的对象（包括正在读取的当前对象）的引用的累积数量。仅当从流中读取对象时才调用过滤器，而对于图元则不调用。

trans-unit.source: Set the set of styles to be used to render the various HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于渲染各种HTML元素的样式集。

trans-unit.source: Set the set of styles to be used to render the various HTML elements. These styles are specified in terms of CSS specifications. Each document produced by the kit will have a copy of the sheet which it can add the document specific styles to. By default, the StyleSheet specified is shared by all HTMLEditorKit instances. This should be reimplemented to provide a finer granularity if desired.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于渲染各种HTML元素的样式集。这些样式是用CSS规范来指定的。每一个由工具包生成的文档都有一个样式表的副本,它可以添加文档的特定样式。默认情况下,指定的样式表被所有HTMLEditorKit实例共享。如果需要的话,应该重新实现这个功能,以提供更精细的粒度。

trans-unit.target: 将滑块的方向设置为 SwingConstants.VERTICAL 或 SwingConstants.HORIZONTAL 。

trans-unit.source: Set the value in a namespace defined on an object. Call sites with this operation should have a signature of (receiver, name, value)→void or (receiver, value)→void when used with NamedOperation, with all parameters and return type being of any type (either primitive or reference). This operation must always be used as part of a NamespaceOperation.

trans-unit.source: Set the writer that is to receive the result. Normally, a stream should be used rather than a writer, so that the transformer may use instructions contained in the transformation instructions to control the encoding. However, there are times when it is useful to write to a writer, such as when using a StringWriter.
trans-unit.target: 设置接收结果的写入器。通常情况下,应该使用流而不是写入器,这样变换器就可以使用变换指令中的指令来控制编码。但是,有时向写入器写入数据是有用的,例如使用StringWriter时。

trans-unit.source: Set this VM's default stratum (see Location for a discussion of strata). Overrides the per-class default set in the class file.
trans-unit.target: 设置此虚拟机的默认层（有关层的讨论，请参见 Location ）。覆盖类文件中的每个类默认设置。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the file name of the keytab to get principal's secret key.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为keytab的文件名,以获取校长的秘钥。

trans-unit.source: Set this to the name of the ticket cache that contains user's TGT. If this is set, useTicketCache must also be set to true; Otherwise a configuration error will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为包含用户的TGT的票证缓存的名称。如果已设置，则 useTicketCache 也必须设置为true；否则，必须将true设置为true。否则将返回配置错误。

trans-unit.source: Set this to true if you do not want to be prompted for the password if credentials can not be obtained from the cache, the keytab, or through shared state.(Default is false) If set to true, credential must be obtained through cache, keytab, or shared state. Otherwise, authentication will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "true",则在无法从缓存、keytab或共享状态中获取凭证时,不希望被提示密码。(默认为false)如果设置为 "true",则必须通过缓存、keytab或共享状态获取凭证。否则,认证将失败。

trans-unit.source: Set this to true if you want the module to get the principal's key from the the keytab.(default value is False) If keytab is not set then the module will locate the keytab from the Kerberos configuration file. If it is not specified in the Kerberos configuration file then it will look for the file {user.home}{file.separator}krb5.keytab.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望模块从密钥表中获取主体的密钥，请将其设置为true。（默认值为False）。如果未设置 keytab ,则模块将从Kerberos配置文件中找到密钥表。如果未在Kerberos配置文件中指定它，则它将查找文件 {user.home}{file.separator} krb5.keytab。

trans-unit.source: Set this to true to if you want the keytab or the principal's key to be stored in the Subject's private credentials. For isInitiator being false, if principal is "*", the KeyTab stored can be used by anyone, otherwise, it's restricted to be used by the specified principal only.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望将密钥表或主体的密钥存储在主题的专用凭据中，则将其设置为true。对于 isInitiator 是假的，如果 principal 是“*”，该 KeyTab 存储的数据可以被任何人使用，否则，它受限于仅由指定的主体使用。

trans-unit.source: Set this to true, if initiator. Set this to false, if acceptor only. (Default is true). Note: Do not set this value to false for initiators.
trans-unit.target: 如果是发起人,则设置为true。如果只是接受者,则设置为false。默认值为true)。注意:如果是发起者,不要将此值设为false。

trans-unit.source: Set this to true, if you want the TGT to be obtained from the ticket cache. Set this option to false if you do not want this module to use the ticket cache. (Default is False). This module will search for the ticket cache in the following locations: On Linux it will look for the ticket cache in /tmp/krb5cc_uid where the uid is numeric user identifier. If the ticket cache is not available in the above location, or if we are on a Windows platform, it will look for the cache as {user.home}{file.separator}krb5cc_{user.name}. You can override the ticket cache location by using ticketCache. For Windows, if a ticket cannot be retrieved from the file ticket cache, it will use Local Security Authority (LSA) API to get the TGT.
trans-unit.target: 如果希望从票证缓存中获取TGT，请将其设置为true。如果您不希望此模块使用票证缓存，请将此选项设置为false。（默认为False）。该模块将在以下位置搜索票证缓存：在Linux上，它将在/ tmp / krb5cc_ uid 中查找票证缓存，其中uid是数字用户标识符。如果票证缓存在上述位置不可用，或者我们在Windows平台上，则它将以{user.home} {file.separator} krb5cc_ {user.name}查找缓存。您可以使用 ticketCache 覆盖票证缓存位置。对于Windows，如果无法从文件票证缓存中检索票证，它将使用本地安全授权（LSA）API来获取TGT。

trans-unit.source: Set this to true, if you want the configuration to be refreshed before the login method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在调用 login 方法之前刷新配置，请将其设置为true 。

trans-unit.source: Set this to true, if you want to renew the TGT when it's more than half-way expired (the time until expiration is less than the time since start time). If this is set, useTicketCache must also be set to true; otherwise a configuration error will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在TGT过期一半以上（直到到期的时间少于从开始时间开始的时间）更新TGT，请将其设置为true。如果已设置，则 useTicketCache 也必须设置为true；否则，必须将true设置为true。否则将返回配置错误。

trans-unit.source: Set time as one unit, including optional milliseconds.

trans-unit.source: Set time as one unit, including the optional infinite precision fractional seconds.

trans-unit.source: Set time as one unit.

trans-unit.source: Set to true if dispatch() catches Throwable and stores it in the exception instance variable. If false, Throwables are propagated up to the EventDispatchThread's dispatch loop.
trans-unit.target: 如果dispatch()捕获Throwable并将其存储在异常实例变量中,则设置为true。如果设置为false,则Throwable会被传播到EventDispatchThread的dispatch循环中。

trans-unit.target: 设置是否在此格式中使用分组。

trans-unit.source: Set whether to read fields corresponding to TIFFTags not in the allowed TIFFTagSets.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否在允许的 TIFFTagSet 中不读取与 TIFFTag 相对应的字段。

trans-unit.source: Set whether to read fields corresponding to TIFFTags not in the allowed TIFFTagSets. The default setting is false. If the TIFF ImageReader is ignoring metadata, then a setting of true is overridden as all metadata are ignored except those essential to reading the image itself.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否在允许的 TIFFTagSet 中不读取与 TIFFTag 相对应的字段。默认设置为 false 。如果TIFF ImageReader 忽略元数据，则设置 true 将被覆盖，因为所有元数据都将被忽略，除了读取图像本身必不可少的那些元数据。

trans-unit.source: Set which outgoing interface on which to send multicast packets.
trans-unit.target: 设置在哪个外发接口上发送组播数据包。

trans-unit.source: Set which outgoing interface on which to send multicast packets. Useful on hosts with multiple network interfaces, where applications want to use other than the system default. Takes/returns an InetAddress.
trans-unit.target: 设置在哪个外发接口上发送组播数据包。在有多个网络接口的主机上很有用,如果应用程序想使用系统默认接口以外的接口。获取/返回一个InetAddress。

trans-unit.source: Sets alive to false.
trans-unit.target: 设置 alive 为false。

trans-unit.source: Sets alive to false. Note that this is a one way operation; dead edits cannot be resurrected. Sending undo or redo to a dead edit results in an exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 设置 alive 为false。请注意，这是一种单向操作。无效的修改无法恢复。将 undo 或 redo 发送到无效的编辑会导致引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets inProgress to false.
trans-unit.target: 将 inProgress 设置为false。

trans-unit.source: Sets wantsInput to true. Use setInitialSelectionValue to specify the initially-chosen value. After the pane as been enabled, inputValue is set to the value the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: 将 wantsInput 设置为true。使用 setInitialSelectionValue 指定初始选择的值。启用窗格后，将 inputValue 设置为用户选择的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets Descriptor (full replace).
trans-unit.target: 设置描述符(完全替换)。

trans-unit.source: Sets SO_BROADCAST for a socket.
trans-unit.target: 为一个套接字设置 SO_BROADCAST。

trans-unit.source: Sets SO_BROADCAST for a socket. This option enables and disables the ability of the process to send broadcast messages. It is supported for only datagram sockets and only on networks that support the concept of a broadcast message (e.g. Ethernet, token ring, etc.), and it is set by default for DatagramSockets.
trans-unit.target: 为套接字设置SO_BROADCAST。这个选项可以启用和禁用进程发送广播消息的能力。它只支持数据报套接字,并且只在支持广播消息概念的网络(如以太网、令牌环等)上支持,默认情况下,它是为数据报套接字设置的。

trans-unit.source: Sets SO_REUSEADDR for a socket.
trans-unit.target: 设置插座的SO_REUSEADDR。

trans-unit.source: Sets SO_REUSEADDR for a socket. This is used only for MulticastSockets in java, and it is set by default for MulticastSockets.
trans-unit.target: 为套接字设置SO_REUSEADDR。这只用于java中的MulticastSockets,默认情况下,MulticastSockets的SO_REUSEADDR是被设置的。

trans-unit.source: Sets SO_REUSEPORT for a socket.
trans-unit.target: 为套接字设置SO_REUSEPORT。

trans-unit.source: Sets SO_REUSEPORT for a socket. This option enables and disables the ability to have multiple sockets listen to the same address and port.
trans-unit.target: 设置套接字的SO_REUSEPORT。这个选项可以启用或禁用多个套接字监听同一地址和端口的功能。

trans-unit.source: Sets a 'mixing-cutout' shape for this lightweight component.
trans-unit.target: 为这个轻量级组件设置一个 "混合切割 "形状。

trans-unit.source: Sets a 'mixing-cutout' shape for this lightweight component. This method is used exclusively for the purposes of the Heavyweight/Lightweight Components Mixing feature and will have no effect if applied to a heavyweight component. By default a lightweight component is treated as an opaque rectangle for the purposes of the Heavyweight/Lightweight Components Mixing feature. This method enables developers to set an arbitrary shape to be cut out from heavyweight components positioned underneath the lightweight component in the z-order.
trans-unit.target: 为这个轻量级组件设置一个 "混合切割 "形状。此方法仅用于 "重量级/轻量级组件混合 "功能的目的,如果应用于重量级组件,则没有任何效果。在默认情况下,一个轻量级组件被视为一个不透明的矩形,用于重量级/轻量级组件混合功能的目的。这种方法使开发人员能够设置一个任意的形状,以便从位于轻量级组件下方的重量级组件中按z顺序切割出来。

trans-unit.source: Sets a ProxySelector.
trans-unit.target: 设置 ProxySelector 。

trans-unit.source: Sets a Bindings of attributes for the given scope.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定范围的属性 Bindings 。

trans-unit.source: Sets a Bindings of attributes for the given scope. If the value of scope is ENGINE_SCOPE the given Bindings replaces the engineScope field. If the value of scope is GLOBAL_SCOPE the given Bindings replaces the globalScope field.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定范围的属性 Bindings 。如果范围值为 ENGINE_SCOPE 给定的 Bindings 替换 engineScope 领域。如果作用域的值为 GLOBAL_SCOPE ,则给定的 Bindings 将替换 globalScope 字段。

trans-unit.source: Sets a VM option of the given name to the specified value. The new value will be reflected in a new VMOption object returned by the getVMOption(java.lang.String) method or the getDiagnosticOptions() method. This method does not change the value of this VMOption object.

trans-unit.source: Sets a default cell editor to be used if no editor has been set in a TableColumn. If no editing is required in a table, or a particular column in a table, uses the isCellEditable method in the TableModel interface to ensure that this JTable will not start an editor in these columns. If editor is null, removes the default editor for this column class.
trans-unit.target: 设置如果未在 TableColumn 中设置编辑器的情况下使用的默认单元格编辑器。如果不需要在表或表中的特定列上进行 isCellEditable ，请在 TableModel 接口中使用isCellEditable方法，以确保此 JTable 不会在这些列中启动编辑器。如果editor为 null ，则删除此列类的默认编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Sets a default proposed value for the SO_RCVBUF option for sockets accepted from this ServerSocket. The value actually set in the accepted socket must be determined by calling Socket.getReceiveBufferSize() after the socket is returned by accept().
trans-unit.target: 为从此 ServerSocket 接受的套接字设置 SO_RCVBUF 选项的默认建议值。接受套接字中实际设置的值必须通过 accept() 返回套接字后调用 Socket.getReceiveBufferSize() 来确定。

trans-unit.source: Sets a generator of temp variable names for VarSnippet of Snippet.SubKind.TEMP_VAR_EXPRESSION_SUBKIND.
trans-unit.target: 为 VarSnippet 的 Snippet.SubKind.TEMP_VAR_EXPRESSION_SUBKIND 设置临时变量名称的生成器。

trans-unit.source: Sets a hint for this image about how important acceleration is.
trans-unit.target: 为这个图像设置一个关于加速度重要性的提示。

trans-unit.source: Sets a hint for this image about how important acceleration is. This priority hint is used to compare to the priorities of other Image objects when determining how to use scarce acceleration resources such as video memory. When and if it is possible to accelerate this Image, if there are not enough resources available to provide that acceleration but enough can be freed up by de-accelerating some other image of lower priority, then that other Image may be de-accelerated in deference to this one. Images that have the same priority take up resources on a first-come, first-served basis.
trans-unit.target: 为该图像设置一个关于加速重要性的提示。当决定如何使用稀缺的加速资源(如视频内存)时,该优先级提示用于与其他Image对象的优先级进行比较。当和如果可以加速这个图像时,如果没有足够的资源来提供加速,但可以通过取消其他低优先级图像的加速来释放足够的资源,那么其他图像可能会被取消加速,以服从于这个图像。具有相同优先级的图像按先到先得的原则占用资源。

Must have the same effect as getBindings(ScriptContext.ENGINE_SCOPE).put.

trans-unit.target: 设置底层数据源上的锁,锁的级别为

trans-unit.source: Sets a method handle transformer that is supposed to act as the implementation of LinkerServices.filterInternalObjects(MethodHandle) for linker services of dynamic linkers created by this factory.
trans-unit.target: 设置方法句柄转换器，该转换器应该用作此工厂创建的动态链接器的链接器服务的 LinkerServices.filterInternalObjects(MethodHandle) 的实现。

trans-unit.source: Sets a method handle transformer that is supposed to act as the implementation of LinkerServices.filterInternalObjects(MethodHandle) for linker services of dynamic linkers created by this factory. Some language runtimes can have internal objects that should not escape their scope. They can add a transformer here that will modify the method handle so that any parameters that can receive potentially internal language runtime objects will have a filter added on them to prevent them from escaping, potentially by wrapping them. The transformer can also potentially add an unwrapping filter to the return value. DefaultInternalObjectFilter is provided as a convenience class for easily creating such filtering transformers.
trans-unit.target: 设置方法句柄转换器，该转换器应该用作此工厂创建的动态链接器的链接器服务的 LinkerServices.filterInternalObjects(MethodHandle) 的实现。某些语言运行时可以具有不应逃避其范围的内部对象。他们可以在此处添加一个转换器，该转换器将修改方法句柄，以便任何可以接收潜在内部语言运行时对象的参数都将添加一个过滤器，以防止它们通过包装而逃脱。转换器还可能在返回值中添加展开式滤波器。提供 DefaultInternalObjectFilter 作为便利类，用于轻松创建此类过滤转换器。

trans-unit.source: Sets a pairwise ordering between two service provider objects within a given category.

trans-unit.source: Sets a pairwise ordering between two service provider objects within a given category. If one or both objects are not currently registered within the given category, or if no ordering is currently set between them, nothing happens and false is returned.
trans-unit.target: 在给定类别中的两个服务提供者对象之间设置成对排序。如果一个或两个对象当前未在给定类别中注册，或者如果它们之间当前未设置任何顺序，则什么也不会发生，并且返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Sets a pairwise ordering between two service provider objects within a given category. If one or both objects are not currently registered within the given category, or if the desired ordering is already set, nothing happens and false is returned. If the providers previously were ordered in the reverse direction, that ordering is removed.
trans-unit.target: 在给定类别中的两个服务提供者对象之间设置成对排序。如果当前未在给定类别中注册一个或两个对象，或者如果已经设置了所需的顺序，则不进行任何操作，并返回 false 。如果以前按相反的方向订购了提供者，那么将取消该订购。

trans-unit.source: Sets a particular tagged data element in the profile from a byte array.

trans-unit.source: Sets a particular tagged data element in the profile from a byte array. The array should contain data in a format, corresponded to the tagSignature as defined in the ICC specification, section 10. This method is useful for advanced applets or applications which need to access profile data directly.
trans-unit.target: 从字节数组设置配置文件中的特定标记数据元素。数组应包含与ICC规范第10节中定义的 tagSignature 对应的格式的数据。此方法对需要直接访问概要文件数据的高级applet或应用程序很有用。

trans-unit.source: Sets a specified listener to receive notification of events describing the progress of this compilation task. If another listener is receiving notifications as a result of a prior call of this method, then that listener will no longer receive notifications. Informally, this method is equivalent to calling removeTaskListener for any listener that has been previously set, followed by addTaskListener for the new listener.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个指定的侦听器，以接收描述该编译任务进度的事件通知。如果另一个侦听器由于先前调用此方法而接收到通知，则该侦听器将不再接收通知。通俗地说，这种方法相当于调用 removeTaskListener 对于先前已设置的任何听众，其次是 addTaskListener 新听众。

The effect of not setting a timeout is the same as setting an infinite Duration, i.e. block forever.

trans-unit.source: Sets all the calendar field values and the time value (millisecond offset from the Epoch) of this Calendar undefined.

trans-unit.source: Sets all the calendar field values and the time value (millisecond offset from the Epoch) of this Calendar undefined. This means that isSet() will return false for all the calendar fields, and the date and time calculations will treat the fields as if they had never been set. A Calendar implementation class may use its specific default field values for date/time calculations. For example, GregorianCalendar uses 1970 if the YEAR field value is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 将所有的日历字段值和时间值（毫秒从偏移大纪元如此） Calendar 不确定。这意味着 isSet() 对于所有日历字段都将返回 false ，并且日期和时间计算将把这些字段当作从未设置过的字段。一个 Calendar 实现类可以使用其特定的默认域值的日期/时间计算。例如，如果未定义 YEAR 字段值，则 GregorianCalendar 使用1970 。

trans-unit.source: Sets all the calendar field values and the time value (millisecond offset from the Epoch) of this Calendar undefined. A Calendar implementation class may use its specific default field values for date/time calculations. For example, GregorianCalendar uses 1970 if the YEAR field value is undefined.

If the attribute values are unordered, this method sets the value that happens to be at that index to attrVal, unless attrVal is already one of the values. In that case, IllegalStateException is thrown.

trans-unit.source: Sets an image to be displayed in the titlebar of this internal frame (usually in the top-left corner). Some look and feels might not support displaying an icon in the titlebar. This image is not the desktopIcon object, which is the image displayed in the JDesktop when this internal frame is iconified. Passing null to this function is valid, but the look and feel can choose the appropriate behavior for that situation, such as displaying no icon or a default icon for the look and feel.
trans-unit.target: 设置要在此内部框架的标题栏中显示的图像（通常在左上角）。某些外观可能不支持在标题栏中显示图标。该图像不是 desktopIcon 对象，而是当此内部框架被图标化时在 JDesktop 中显示的图像。将 null 传递给此函数是有效的，但外观可以针对该情况选择适当的行为，例如不显示图标或外观的默认图标。

trans-unit.source: Sets an object representing the conversion strategy for automatic type conversions.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个对象,表示自动类型转换的转换策略。

trans-unit.source: Sets an object representing the conversion strategy for automatic type conversions. After LinkerServices.asType(MethodHandle, MethodType) has applied all custom conversions to a method handle, it still needs to effect method invocation conversions that can usually be automatically applied as per MethodHandle.asType(MethodType). However, sometimes language runtimes will want to customize even those conversions for their own call sites. A typical example is allowing unboxing of null return values, which is by default prohibited by ordinary MethodHandles.asType(). In this case, a language runtime can install its own custom automatic conversion strategy, that can deal with null values. Note that when the strategy's MethodTypeConversionStrategy.asType(MethodHandle, MethodType) is invoked, the custom language conversions will already have been applied to the method handle, so by design the difference between the handle's current method type and the desired final type will always only be ones that can be subjected to method invocation conversions. The strategy also doesn't need to invoke a final MethodHandle.asType() as that will be done internally as the final step.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个代表自动类型转换的转换策略的对象。后 LinkerServices.asType(MethodHandle, MethodType) 已应用所有定制的转换的方法处理，它仍然需要效果 method invocation conversions ，可以通常按自动应用 MethodHandle.asType(MethodType) 。但是，有时语言运行库甚至希望针对其自己的调用站点自定义那些转换。一个典型的示例是允许对空返回值进行拆箱，默认情况下，这是普通 MethodHandles.asType() 禁止的。在这种情况下，语言运行库可以安装自己的自定义自动转换策略，该策略可以处理空值。请注意，当该策略的 MethodTypeConversionStrategy.asType(MethodHandle, MethodType) ，自定义语言转换将已应用于方法句柄，因此通过设计该句柄的当前方法类型与所需的最终类型之间的差异将始终仅是可以接受的方法调用转换。该策略也不需要调用最终的 MethodHandle.asType() ,因为这将在最后一步内部完成。

trans-unit.target: 将此 Socket 的 SO_SNDBUF 选项设置为指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SO_SNDBUF option to the specified value for this Socket. The SO_SNDBUF option is used by the platform's networking code as a hint for the size to set the underlying network I/O buffers.
trans-unit.target: 将此 Socket 的 SO_SNDBUF 选项设置为指定的值。平台的网络代码将 SO_SNDBUF 选项用作设置基础网络I / O缓冲区大小的提示。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Value of a LocalVariable in this frame.
trans-unit.target: 设定 Value 一的 LocalVariable 在这个框架。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Value of a LocalVariable in this frame. The variable must be valid for this frame's method and visible according to the rules described in visibleVariables().
trans-unit.target: 设定 Value 一的 LocalVariable 在这个框架。该变量必须对此框架的方法有效，并且必须根据 visibleVariables() 中描述的规则可见。

trans-unit.source: Sets the AbstractFormatterFactory.
trans-unit.target: 设置 AbstractFormatterFactory 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the AbstractFormatterFactory. AbstractFormatterFactory is able to return an instance of AbstractFormatter that is used to format a value for display, as well an enforcing an editing policy.
trans-unit.target: 设置 AbstractFormatterFactory 。 AbstractFormatterFactory 能够返回 AbstractFormatter 的实例，该实例用于格式化显示值以及强制执行编辑策略。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Accessible parent of this object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此对象的 Accessible 父级。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Accessible parent of this object. This is meant to be used only in the situations where the actual component's parent should not be treated as the component's accessible parent and is a method that should only be called by the parent of the accessible child.
trans-unit.target: 设置此对象的 Accessible 父级。仅在不将实际组件的父级视为组件的可访问父级的情况下才使用此方法，并且该方法仅应由可访问子级的父级调用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Action for the ActionEvent source.
trans-unit.target: 为 ActionEvent 源设置 Action 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Action for the ActionEvent source. The new Action replaces any previously set Action but does not affect ActionListeners independently added with addActionListener. If the Action is already a registered ActionListener for the ActionEvent source, it is not re-registered.
trans-unit.target: 为 ActionEvent 源设置 Action 。新的 Action 替换任何以前设置的 Action ，但不影响 ActionListeners 与单独添加 addActionListener 方法。如果 Action 已经是一个注册 ActionListener 的 ActionEvent 的源，它不需要重新注册。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Action.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Action 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Action. The new Action replaces any previously set Action but does not affect ActionListeners independently added with addActionListener. If the Action is already a registered ActionListener for the button, it is not re-registered.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Action 。新的 Action 替换任何以前设置的 Action ，但不影响 ActionListeners 与单独添加 addActionListener 方法。如果该 Action 已经是该按钮的已注册 ActionListener ，则不会重新注册它。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ActionMap to am.
trans-unit.target: 将 ActionMap 设置为 am 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ActionMap to am. This does not set the parent of the am to be the ActionMap from the UI (if there was one), it is up to the caller to have done this.
trans-unit.target: 将 ActionMap 设置为 am 。这不会将 am 的父级设置为UI中的 ActionMap （如果有的话），这取决于调用方。

trans-unit.source: Sets the BeanContext for this BeanContextChildSupport.
trans-unit.target: 设置 BeanContext 此 BeanContextChildSupport 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the BeanContext from which this event was propagated.
trans-unit.target: 设置从中传播此事件的 BeanContext 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Bindings with the corresponding scope value in the context field.
trans-unit.target: 在 context 字段中使用相应的作用域值设置 Bindings 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the BoundedRangeModel that handles the slider's three fundamental properties: minimum, maximum, value.
trans-unit.target: 设置处理滑块的三个基本属性的 BoundedRangeModel ：最小值，最大值，值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the CachedRowSet object's page-size.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CachedRowSet 对象的页面大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the CachedRowSet object's page-size. A CachedRowSet may be configured to populate itself in page-size sized batches of rows. When either populate() or execute() are called, the CachedRowSet fetches an additional page according to the original SQL query used to populate the RowSet.
trans-unit.target: 设置 CachedRowSet 对象的页面大小。甲 CachedRowSet 的可被配置成填充本身中的行页尺寸的尺寸的批次。当任一 populate() 或 execute() 被调用时， CachedRowSet 的根据用于填充RowSet的原始SQL查询提取一个附加页。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Comparator to use when sorting the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Comparator 在对指定列进行排序时使用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Comparator to use when sorting the specified column. This does not trigger a sort. If you want to sort after setting the comparator you need to explicitly invoke sort.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Comparator 在对指定列进行排序时使用。这不会触发排序。如果要在设置比较器后进行排序，则需要显式调用 sort 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ComponentOrientation property of this component and all components contained within it.
trans-unit.target: 设置此组件及其中包含的所有组件的 ComponentOrientation 属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ComponentOrientation property of this container and all components contained within it.
trans-unit.target: 设置此容器及其中包含的所有组件的 ComponentOrientation 属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ComponentOrientation property of this menu and all components contained within it.
trans-unit.target: 设置此菜单的 ComponentOrientation 属性以及其中包含的所有组件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ComponentOrientation property of this menu and all components contained within it. This includes all components returned by getMenuComponents.
trans-unit.target: 设置此菜单的 ComponentOrientation 属性以及其中包含的所有组件。这包括 getMenuComponents 返回的所有组件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Composite for the Graphics2D context.
trans-unit.target: 为 Graphics2D 上下文设置 Composite 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Composite for the Graphics2D context. The Composite is used in all drawing methods such as drawImage, drawString, draw, and fill. It specifies how new pixels are to be combined with the existing pixels on the graphics device during the rendering process.
trans-unit.target: 为 Graphics2D 上下文设置 Composite 。该 Composite 在所有的绘图方法，如使用 drawImage ， drawString 之， draw 和 fill 。它指定在渲染过程中如何将新像素与图形设备上的现有像素合并。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ContentHandlerFactory of an application.
trans-unit.target: 设置应用程序的 ContentHandlerFactory 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ContentHandlerFactory of an application. It can be called at most once by an application.
trans-unit.target: 设置应用程序的 ContentHandlerFactory 。一个应用程序最多只能调用一次。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Cursor of this object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此对象的 Cursor 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the DataSource name property for this RowSet object to the given logical name and sets this RowSet object's Url property to null.
trans-unit.target: 将此 RowSet 对象的 DataSource 名称属性设置为给定的逻辑名称，并将此 RowSet 对象的Url属性设置为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the DataSource name property for this RowSet object to the given logical name and sets this RowSet object's Url property to null. The name must have been bound to a DataSource object in a JNDI naming service so that an application can do a lookup using that name to retrieve the DataSource object bound to it. The DataSource object can then be used to establish a connection to the data source it represents.
trans-unit.target: 将此 RowSet 对象的 DataSource 名称属性设置为给定的逻辑名称，并将此 RowSet 对象的Url属性设置为 null 。该名称必须已绑定到JNDI命名服务中的 DataSource 对象，以便应用程序可以使用该名称进行查找以检索绑定到它的 DataSource 对象。所述 DataSource 然后对象可被用来建立到它所表示的数据源的连接。

trans-unit.source: Sets the DesktopManger that will handle desktop-specific UI actions.
trans-unit.target: 设置将处理特定于桌面的UI操作的 DesktopManger 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the DesktopManger that will handle desktop-specific UI actions. This may be overridden by LookAndFeel.
trans-unit.target: 设置将处理特定于桌面的UI操作的 DesktopManger 。这可能会被 LookAndFeel 覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Sets the DocumentFilter.
trans-unit.target: 设置 DocumentFilter 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the DocumentFilter. The DocumentFilter is passed insert and remove to conditionally allow inserting/deleting of the text. A null value indicates that no filtering will occur.
trans-unit.target: 设置 DocumentFilter 。将 DocumentFilter 传递给 insert 和 remove ,以便有条件地允许插入/删除文本。甲 null 值指示将不发生滤波。

trans-unit.source: Sets the FlavorMap associated with this DropTarget.
trans-unit.target: 设置与此 DropTarget 关联的 FlavorMap 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Font of this object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此对象的 Font 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the GregorianCalendar change date.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GregorianCalendar 更改日期。

trans-unit.source: Sets the GregorianCalendar change date. This is the point when the switch from Julian dates to Gregorian dates occurred. Default is October 15, 1582 (Gregorian). Previous to this, dates will be in the Julian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GregorianCalendar 更改日期。这是从儒略历转换为公历的时候。默认值为1582年10月15日（格雷戈里安）。在此之前，日期将在儒略历中。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Group that positions and sizes components along the horizontal axis.
trans-unit.target: 设置沿水平轴定位和调整组件尺寸的 Group 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Group that positions and sizes components along the vertical axis.
trans-unit.target: 设置沿垂直轴定位和调整组件尺寸的 Group 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the HostnameVerifier for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 设置此实例的 HostnameVerifier 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the IIOMetadata to a new object, or null.
trans-unit.target: 将 IIOMetadata 设置为新对象，或者为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the IIOMetadataController to be used to provide settings for this IIOMetadata object when the activateController method is called, overriding any default controller.
trans-unit.target: 设置 IIOMetadataController ，用于在调用 activateController 方法时用于为此 IIOMetadata 对象提供设置，从而覆盖所有默认控制器。

trans-unit.source: Sets the IIOMetadataController to be used to provide settings for this IIOMetadata object when the activateController method is called, overriding any default controller. If the argument is null, no controller will be used, including any default. To restore the default, use setController(getDefaultController()).
trans-unit.target: 设置 IIOMetadataController ，用于在调用 activateController 方法时用于为此 IIOMetadata 对象提供设置，从而覆盖任何默认控制器。如果参数为 null ，则将不使用任何控制器，包括任何默认值。要恢复默认值，请使用 setController(getDefaultController()) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the IIOParamController to be used to provide settings for this IIOParam object when the activateController method is called, overriding any default controller.
trans-unit.target: 设置 IIOParamController ,以在调用 activateController 方法时用于为此 IIOParam 对象提供设置，从而覆盖所有默认控制器。

trans-unit.source: Sets the IIOParamController to be used to provide settings for this IIOParam object when the activateController method is called, overriding any default controller. If the argument is null, no controller will be used, including any default. To restore the default, use setController(getDefaultController()).
trans-unit.target: 设置 IIOParamController ,以在调用 activateController 方法时用于为此 IIOParam 对象提供设置，从而覆盖任何默认控制器。如果参数为 null ，则将不使用任何控制器，包括任何默认值。要恢复默认值，请使用 setController(getDefaultController()) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the InputMap to use under the condition condition to map.
trans-unit.target: 设置 InputMap 在条件 condition 要使用 map 。

trans-unit.target: 设置 InputMap 在条件 condition 要使用 map 。一个 null 值意味着你不希望使用任何绑定，即使是从UI。这不会重新安装UI InputMap （如果有的话）。 condition 具有以下值之一：

trans-unit.source: Sets the JComboBox.
trans-unit.target: 设置 JComboBox 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JDesktopIcon associated with this JInternalFrame.
trans-unit.target: 设置与此 JInternalFrame 关联的 JDesktopIcon 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JFileChooser to allow the user to just select files, just select directories, or select both files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 设置 JFileChooser 以允许用户仅选择文件，仅选择目录或同时选择文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JFileChooser to allow the user to just select files, just select directories, or select both files and directories. The default is JFilesChooser.FILES_ONLY.
trans-unit.target: 设置 JFileChooser 以允许用户仅选择文件，仅选择目录或同时选择文件和目录。默认值为 JFilesChooser.FILES_ONLY 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatter to use as a last resort, eg in case a display, edit or null JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatter has not been specified.
trans-unit.target: 设置 JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatter 用作最后手段，例如，如果未指定显示，编辑或为空的 JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatter 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatter to use if the JFormattedTextField is being edited and either the value is not-null, or the value is null and a null formatter has has not been specified.
trans-unit.target: 设置 JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatter 以在编辑 JFormattedTextField 且该值不为null或值为null且尚未指定null格式化程序时使用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatter to use if the JFormattedTextField is not being edited and either the value is not-null, or the value is null and a null formatter has has not been specified.
trans-unit.target: 设置 JFormattedTextField.AbstractFormatter 以在未编辑 JFormattedTextField 且值不为null或值为null且尚未指定null格式化程序时使用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JInternalFrame title.
trans-unit.target: 设置 JInternalFrame 标题。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JInternalFrame title. title may have a null value.
trans-unit.target: 设置 JInternalFrame 标题。 title 的值可能为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JInternalFrame with which this DesktopIcon is associated.
trans-unit.target: 设置与此 DesktopIcon 关联的 JInternalFrame 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JLayer's glassPane component, which can be null.
trans-unit.target: 设置 JLayer 的glassPane组件，该组件可以为 null 。

trans-unit.target: 设置 JLayer 的view组件，可以为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JPopupMenu for this JComponent.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 JComponent 的 JPopupMenu 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JPopupMenu for this JComponent. The UI is responsible for registering bindings and adding the necessary listeners such that the JPopupMenu will be shown at the appropriate time. When the JPopupMenu is shown depends upon the look and feel: some may show it on a mouse event, some may enable a key binding.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 JComponent 的 JPopupMenu 。UI负责注册绑定并添加必要的侦听器，以便 JPopupMenu 将在适当的时间显示。当 JPopupMenu 的显示取决于外观：有些人可能会显示它上的鼠标事件，有些人可能启用键绑定。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JSpinner's layout manager to null.
trans-unit.target: 将 JSpinner's 布局管理器设置为null。

trans-unit.target: 将 JSpinner's 布局管理器设置为null。该方法由 uninstallUI 调用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JViewport's one lightweight child (view), which can be null.

trans-unit.source: Sets the JViewport's one lightweight child, which can be null.
trans-unit.target: 设置 JViewport 的一个轻量级子级，可以为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the JViewport's one lightweight child, which can be null. (Since there is only one child which occupies the entire viewport, the constraints and index arguments are ignored.)
trans-unit.target: 设置 JViewport 的一个轻量级子级，可以为 null 。（由于只有一个孩子占据了整个视口，因此将忽略 constraints 和 index 参数。）

trans-unit.target: 为特定线程设置 KeyboardFocusManager 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the LayoutManager.
trans-unit.target: 设置 LayoutManager 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the LayoutManager. Overridden to conditionally forward the call to the contentPane. Refer to RootPaneContainer for more information.
trans-unit.target: 设置 LayoutManager 。重写以有条件地将调用转发到 contentPane 。有关更多信息，请参考 RootPaneContainer 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the LayoutStyle used to calculate the preferred gaps between components.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于计算组件之间的首选间距的 LayoutStyle 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the LayoutStyle used to calculate the preferred gaps between components. A value of null indicates the shared instance of LayoutStyle should be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于计算组件之间的首选间距的 LayoutStyle 。值为 null 表示应使用 LayoutStyle 的共享实例。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ListUI, the look and feel object that renders this component.
trans-unit.target: 设置 ListUI ，即呈现此组件的外观对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets the MBeanServer to which this connector server is attached.
trans-unit.target: 设置连接器服务器连接到的 MBeanServer 。

trans-unit.target: 设置连接器服务器连接到的 MBeanServer 。新的客户端连接将与此 MBeanServer 进行交互。现有的客户端连接不受影响。

trans-unit.target: 设置 NavigationFilter 。 NavigationFilter 由 DefaultCaret 和默认光标移动动作用作限制光标移动的方式。

trans-unit.target: 设置 Object ,其字符串表示形式将用作 headerRenderer 的值。当 TableColumn 的创建，默认的 headerValue 为 null 。

trans-unit.target: 设置 Graphics2D 上下文的 Paint 属性。

trans-unit.target: 设置 Graphics2D 上下文的 Paint 属性。用 null Paint 对象调用此方法对此 Graphics2D 的当前 Paint 属性没有任何影响。

trans-unit.target: 设置此 PageFormat 的 Paper 对象。

trans-unit.target: 设置将用于获取 Popup 的 PopupFactory 。

trans-unit.target: 设置将用于获取 Popup 的 PopupFactory 。如果 factory 为null，则将抛出 IllegalArgumentException 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Reader for scripts to read input .
trans-unit.target: 设置 Reader 的脚本以读取输入。

trans-unit.target: 设置 RowSorter 。

trans-unit.target: 设置 RowSorter 。 RowSorter 用于为 JTable 提供排序和筛选。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SSLSocketFactory to be used when this instance creates sockets for secure https URL connections.
trans-unit.target: 设置当此实例创建用于安全https URL连接的套接字时要使用的 SSLSocketFactory 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the ScrollPaneUI object that provides the look and feel (L&F) for this component.
trans-unit.target: 设置 ScrollPaneUI 对象，该对象提供此组件的外观（L＆F）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Set of initial policy identifiers (OID strings), indicating that any one of these policies would be acceptable to the certificate user for the purposes of certification path processing.
trans-unit.target: 设置一 Set 初始策略标识符（OID字符串），以指示出于认证路径处理的目的，证书用户可以接受这些策略中的任何一个。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Set of initial policy identifiers (OID strings), indicating that any one of these policies would be acceptable to the certificate user for the purposes of certification path processing. By default, any policy is acceptable (i.e. all policies), so a user that wants to allow any policy as acceptable does not need to call this method, or can call it with an empty Set (or null).
trans-unit.target: 设置一 Set 初始策略标识符（OID字符串），以指示出于认证路径处理的目的，证书用户可以接受这些策略中的任何一个。默认情况下，任何策略都是可以接受的（即所有策略），因此希望将任何策略允许为可接受的用户无需调用此方法，也可以使用空 Set （或 null ）来调用它。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Set of most-trusted CAs.

trans-unit.target: 将此 SyncProviderException 对象的 SyncResolver 对象设置为提供的对象。如果提供的参数为 null ，则对方法 getSyncResolver 的调用将返回 SyncResolver 接口的默认引用实现。

trans-unit.source: Sets the TableColumn's column margin to newMargin.
trans-unit.target: 将 TableColumn 的列边距设置为 newMargin 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the TableColumn's column margin to newMargin. This method posts a columnMarginChanged event to its listeners.
trans-unit.target: 将 TableColumn 的列边距设置为 newMargin 。此方法将 columnMarginChanged 事件发布到其侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Sets the TableColumn's identifier to anIdentifier.
trans-unit.target: 将 TableColumn 的标识符设置为 anIdentifier 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the TableColumn's maximum width to maxWidth or, if maxWidth is less than the minimum width, to the minimum width.
trans-unit.target: 将 TableColumn 的最大宽度设置为 maxWidth ；如果 maxWidth 小于最小宽度，则将其设置为最小宽度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the TableColumn's minimum width to minWidth, adjusting the new minimum width if necessary to ensure that 0 <= minWidth <= maxWidth.
trans-unit.target: 将 TableColumn 的最小宽度设置为 minWidth ，并在必要时调整新的最小宽度，以确保0 <= minWidth <= maxWidth 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the TableColumn's minimum width to minWidth, adjusting the new minimum width if necessary to ensure that 0 <= minWidth <= maxWidth. For example, if the minWidth argument is negative, this method sets the minWidth property to 0.
trans-unit.target: 将 TableColumn 的最小宽度设置为 minWidth ，并在必要时调整新的最小宽度，以确保0 <= minWidth <= maxWidth 。例如，如果 minWidth 参数为负，则此方法将 minWidth 属性设置为0。

trans-unit.source: Sets the TableModel to use as the underlying model for this TableRowSorter.
trans-unit.target: 设置 TableModel 用作此 TableRowSorter 的基础模型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the TableModel to use as the underlying model for this TableRowSorter. A value of null can be used to set an empty model.
trans-unit.target: 设置 TableModel 用作此 TableRowSorter 的基础模型。值 null 可用于设置空模型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the TimeZone that is returned by the getDefault method.
trans-unit.target: 设置由 getDefault 方法返回的 TimeZone 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the TimeZone that is returned by the getDefault method. zone is cached. If zone is null, the cached default TimeZone is cleared. This method doesn't change the value of the user.timezone property.
trans-unit.target: 设置由 getDefault 方法返回的 TimeZone 。 zone 已缓存。如果 zone 为null，则清除缓存的默认 TimeZone 。此方法不会更改 user.timezone 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Timer's between-event delay, the number of milliseconds between successive action events.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Timer 的事件之间延迟，即连续动作事件之间的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Timer's between-event delay, the number of milliseconds between successive action events. This does not affect the initial delay property, which can be set by the setInitialDelay method.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Timer 的事件之间延迟，即连续动作事件之间的毫秒数。这不会影响可以通过 setInitialDelay 方法设置的初始延迟属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Timer's initial delay, the time in milliseconds to wait after the timer is started before firing the first event.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Timer 的初始延迟，以毫秒为单位，在计时器启动后要触发第一个事件之前要等待的时间。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Timer's initial delay, the time in milliseconds to wait after the timer is started before firing the first event. Upon construction, this is set to be the same as the between-event delay, but then its value is independent and remains unaffected by changes to the between-event delay.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Timer 的初始延迟，以毫秒为单位，在计时器启动后要触发第一个事件之前要等待的时间。在构造时，将其设置为与事件之间的延迟相同，但是随后其值是独立的，并且不受事件之间的延迟变化的影响。

trans-unit.source: Sets the TransferHandler, which provides support for transfer of data into and out of this component via cut/copy/paste and drag and drop.
trans-unit.target: 设置 TransferHandler ，它支持通过剪切/复制/粘贴和拖放操作将数据传入和传出该组件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the TransferHandler, which provides support for transfer of data into and out of this component via cut/copy/paste and drag and drop. This may be null if the component does not support data transfer operations.
trans-unit.target: 设置 TransferHandler ，它支持通过剪切/复制/粘贴和拖放操作将数据传入和传出该组件。如果组件不支持数据传输操作，则该字段可以为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the autoscrolls property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 autoscrolls 属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the autoscrolls property. If true mouse dragged events will be synthetically generated when the mouse is dragged outside of the component's bounds and mouse motion has paused (while the button continues to be held down). The synthetic events make it appear that the drag gesture has resumed in the direction established when the component's boundary was crossed. Components that support autoscrolling must handle mouseDragged events by calling scrollRectToVisible with a rectangle that contains the mouse event's location. All of the Swing components that support item selection and are typically displayed in a JScrollPane (JTable, JList, JTree, JTextArea, and JEditorPane) already handle mouse dragged events in this way. To enable autoscrolling in any other component, add a mouse motion listener that calls scrollRectToVisible. For example, given a JPanel, myPanel:
trans-unit.target: 设置 autoscrolls 属性。如果为 true ，则将鼠标拖动到组件的边界之外并且鼠标移动已暂停（同时继续按住该按钮）时，将综合生成鼠标拖动事件。合成事件使拖动手势看起来已经沿越过组件边界的方向恢复。支持自动滚动的组件必须通过使用包含鼠标事件位置的矩形调用 scrollRectToVisible 来处理 mouseDragged 事件。所有支持项目选择的Swing组件通常显示在 JScrollPane 中（ JTable ， JList ， JTree ， JTextArea 和 JEditorPane ）已经以这种方式处理鼠标拖动事件。要在任何其他组件中启用自动滚动，请添加一个调用 scrollRectToVisible 的鼠标运动侦听器。例如，给定一个 JPanel ， myPanel ：

trans-unit.source: Sets the borderPainted property, which is true if the border should be painted.
trans-unit.target: 设置 borderPainted 属性，如果应绘制边框，则为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the borderPainted property, which is true if the border should be painted. The default value for this property is true. Some look and feels might not implement painted borders; they will ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 borderPainted 属性，如果应绘制边框，则为 true 。此属性的默认值为 true 。某些外观可能无法实现绘制的边框。他们将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the borderPainted property, which is true if the progress bar should paint its border.
trans-unit.target: 设置 borderPainted 属性，如果进度条应绘制其边框，则为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the borderPainted property, which is true if the progress bar should paint its border. The default value for this property is true. Some look and feels might not implement painted borders; they will ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 borderPainted 属性，如果进度条应绘制其边框，则为 true 。此属性的默认值为 true 。某些外观可能无法实现绘制的边框。他们将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the borderPainted property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 borderPainted 属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the borderPainted property. If true and the button has a border, the border is painted. The default value for the borderPainted property is true.
trans-unit.target: 设置 borderPainted 属性。如果为 true ，并且按钮具有边框，则绘制边框。 borderPainted 属性的默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the borderPaintedFlat property, which gives a hint to the look and feel as to the appearance of the check box border.
trans-unit.target: 设置 borderPaintedFlat 属性，该属性可以提示复选框边框的外观。

trans-unit.source: Sets the borderPaintedFlat property, which gives a hint to the look and feel as to the appearance of the check box border. This is usually set to true when a JCheckBox instance is used as a renderer in a component such as a JTable or JTree. The default value for the borderPaintedFlat property is false. This method fires a property changed event. Some look and feels might not implement flat borders; they will ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 borderPaintedFlat 属性，该属性可以提示复选框边框的外观。当将 JCheckBox 实例用作 JTable 或 JTree 之类的组件中的渲染器时，通常将其设置为 true 。 borderPaintedFlat 属性的默认值为 false 。此方法引发属性更改事件。某些外观可能无法实现平坦的边框；他们将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the contentAreaFilled property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 contentAreaFilled 属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the contentAreaFilled property. If true the button will paint the content area. If you wish to have a transparent button, such as an icon only button, for example, then you should set this to false. Do not call setOpaque(false). The default value for the contentAreaFilled property is true.
trans-unit.target: 设置 contentAreaFilled 属性。如果为 true ,则按钮将绘制内容区域。如果您希望有一个透明按钮，例如仅图标按钮，则应将其设置为 false 。不要调用 setOpaque(false) 。 contentAreaFilled 属性的默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the contentPane property for this window.
trans-unit.target: 设置此窗口的 contentPane 属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the contentPane property for this window. This method is called by the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 设置此窗口的 contentPane 属性。此方法由构造函数调用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the contentPane property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 contentPane 属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the contentPane property. This method is called by the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 设置 contentPane 属性。此方法由构造函数调用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the defaultButton property, which determines the current default button for this JRootPane.
trans-unit.target: 设置 defaultButton 属性，该属性确定此 JRootPane 的当前默认按钮。

trans-unit.source: Sets the defaultButton property, which determines the current default button for this JRootPane. The default button is the button which will be activated when a UI-defined activation event (typically the Enter key) occurs in the root pane regardless of whether or not the button has keyboard focus (unless there is another component within the root pane which consumes the activation event, such as a JTextPane). For default activation to work, the button must be an enabled descendent of the root pane when activation occurs. To remove a default button from this root pane, set this property to null.
trans-unit.target: 设置 defaultButton 属性，该属性确定此 JRootPane 的当前默认按钮。默认按钮是在根窗格中发生UI定义的激活事件（通常是Enter键）时将被激活的按钮，而不管该按钮是否具有键盘焦点（除非根窗格中存在消耗该元素的其他组件）激活事件，例如 JTextPane ）。为了使默认激活生效，激活时该按钮必须是根窗格的已启用后代。要从此根窗格中删除默认按钮，请将此属性设置为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the defaultCapable property, which determines whether this button can be made the default button for its root pane.
trans-unit.target: 设置 defaultCapable 属性，该属性确定是否可以将此按钮设为其根窗格的默认按钮。

trans-unit.source: Sets the defaultCapable property, which determines whether this button can be made the default button for its root pane. The default value of the defaultCapable property is true unless otherwise specified by the look and feel.
trans-unit.target: 设置 defaultCapable 属性，该属性确定是否可以将此按钮设为其根窗格的默认按钮。除非外观另有指定，否则 defaultCapable 属性的默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the dragEnabled property, which must be true to enable automatic drag handling (the first part of drag and drop) on this component.
trans-unit.target: 设置 dragEnabled 属性，该属性必须为 true 才能在此组件上启用自动拖动处理（拖放的第一部分）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the dragEnabled property, which must be true to enable automatic drag handling (the first part of drag and drop) on this component. The transferHandler property needs to be set to a non-null value for the drag to do anything. The default value of the dragEnabled property is false.
trans-unit.target: 设置 dragEnabled 属性，该属性必须为 true 才能在此组件上启用自动拖动处理（拖放的第一部分）。需要将 transferHandler 属性设置为非 null 值，以便拖动可以执行任何操作。 dragEnabled 属性的默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the editingColumn variable.
trans-unit.target: 设置 editingColumn 变量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the editingRow variable.
trans-unit.target: 设置 editingRow 变量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the field parameter to the given value.
trans-unit.target: 将 field 参数设置为给定 value 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the field parameter to the given value. field is an index to the Calendar.fields, such as DAY_OF_MONTH. Field value validation is not performed in this method. Any out of range values are either normalized in lenient mode or detected as an invalid value in non-lenient mode when building a Calendar.
trans-unit.target: 将 field 参数设置为给定 value 。 field 是 Calendar.fields 的索引，例如 DAY_OF_MONTH 。在此方法中不执行字段值验证。构建 Calendar 时，任何超出范围的值要么在宽大模式下标准化，要么在非宽大模式下检测为无效值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the floatable property, which must be true for the user to move the tool bar.
trans-unit.target: 设置 floatable 属性，对于用户移动工具栏，该属性必须为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the floatable property, which must be true for the user to move the tool bar. Typically, a floatable tool bar can be dragged into a different position within the same container or out into its own window. The default value of this property is true. Some look and feels might not implement floatable tool bars; they will ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 floatable 属性，对于用户移动工具栏，该属性必须为 true 。通常，可将浮动工具栏拖到同一容器内的不同位置或拖到其自己的窗口中。此属性的默认值为 true 。某些外观可能无法实现可浮动的工具栏。他们将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the glassPane property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 glassPane 属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the glassPane property. This method is called by the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 设置 glassPane 属性。此方法由构造函数调用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the height property, which controls the height of a component.
trans-unit.target: 设置 height 属性，该属性控制组件的高度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the hideActionText property, which determines whether the button displays text from the Action.
trans-unit.target: 设置 hideActionText 属性，该属性确定按钮是否显示 Action 中的文本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the hideActionText property, which determines whether the button displays text from the Action. This is useful only if an Action has been installed on the button.
trans-unit.target: 设置 hideActionText 属性，该属性确定按钮是否显示 Action 中的文本。仅当在按钮上安装了 Action 此功能才有用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the iconable property, which must be true for the user to be able to make the JInternalFrame an icon.
trans-unit.target: 设置 iconable 属性，该属性必须为 true ,以使用户能够使 JInternalFrame 成为图标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the iconable property, which must be true for the user to be able to make the JInternalFrame an icon. Some look and feels might not implement iconification; they will ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 iconable 属性，该属性必须为 true ,以使用户能够使 JInternalFrame 成为图标。某些外观可能无法实现图标化；他们将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the indeterminate property of the progress bar, which determines whether the progress bar is in determinate or indeterminate mode.
trans-unit.target: 设置进度条的 indeterminate 属性，该属性确定进度条处于确定模式还是不确定模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the indeterminate property of the progress bar, which determines whether the progress bar is in determinate or indeterminate mode. An indeterminate progress bar continuously displays animation indicating that an operation of unknown length is occurring. By default, this property is false. Some look and feels might not support indeterminate progress bars; they will ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置进度条的 indeterminate 属性，该属性确定进度条处于确定模式还是不确定模式。不确定的进度条连续显示动画，指示发生未知长度的操作。默认情况下，此属性为 false 。某些外观可能不支持不确定的进度条；他们将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.target: 将 key 属性设置为具有指定 value 。

trans-unit.target: 设置 largeModel 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the largeModel. Called when the largeModel property is changed in the drawn tree component.
trans-unit.target: 设置 largeModel 。在绘制的树组件中更改 largeModel 属性时调用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the layeredPane property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 layeredPane 属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the layeredPane property. This method is called by the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 设置 layeredPane 属性。此方法由构造函数调用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the lightWeightPopupEnabled property, which provides a hint as to whether or not a lightweight Component should be used to contain the JComboBox, versus a heavyweight Component such as a Panel or a Window.
trans-unit.target: 设置 lightWeightPopupEnabled 属性，该属性提供有关是否应使用轻量级 Component 包含 JComboBox 以及重量级 Component 如 Panel 或 Window 的提示。

trans-unit.source: Sets the lightWeightPopupEnabled property, which provides a hint as to whether or not a lightweight Component should be used to contain the JComboBox, versus a heavyweight Component such as a Panel or a Window. The decision of lightweight versus heavyweight is ultimately up to the JComboBox. Lightweight windows are more efficient than heavyweight windows, but lightweight and heavyweight components do not mix well in a GUI. If your application mixes lightweight and heavyweight components, you should disable lightweight popups. The default value for the lightWeightPopupEnabled property is true, unless otherwise specified by the look and feel. Some look and feels always use heavyweight popups, no matter what the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 lightWeightPopupEnabled 属性，该属性提供有关是否应使用轻量级 Component 包含 JComboBox 以及重量级 Component 如 Panel 或 Window 的提示。轻量级与重量级的决定最终取决于 JComboBox 。轻量级窗口比重量级窗口更有效，但是轻量级和重量级组件在GUI中的混合效果不佳。如果您的应用程序混合了轻量级组件和重量级组件，则应禁用轻量级弹出窗口。 lightWeightPopupEnabled 属性的默认值为 true ，除非外观另有指定。无论此属性的值如何，某些外观总是使用重量级弹出窗口。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximizable property, which determines whether the JInternalFrame can be maximized by some user action.
trans-unit.target: 设置 maximizable 属性，该属性确定 JInternalFrame 是否可以通过某些用户操作最大化。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximizable property, which determines whether the JInternalFrame can be maximized by some user action. Some look and feels might not support maximizing internal frames; they will ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 maximizable 属性，该属性确定 JInternalFrame 是否可以通过某些用户操作最大化。某些外观可能不支持最大化内部框架。他们将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the menuBar property for this JInternalFrame.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 JInternalFrame 的 menuBar 属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the paintFocus property, which must be true for the focus state to be painted.
trans-unit.target: 设置 paintFocus 属性，对于要绘制的焦点状态，该属性必须为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the paintFocus property, which must be true for the focus state to be painted. The default value for the paintFocus property is true. Some look and feels might not paint focus state; they will ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 paintFocus 属性，对于要绘制的焦点状态，该属性必须为 true 。 paintFocus 属性的默认值为 true 。某些外观可能无法描绘出焦点状态。他们将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the progress bound property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 progress 绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the progress bound property. The value should be from 0 to 100.
trans-unit.target: 设置 progress 绑定属性。取值范围是0到100。

trans-unit.source: Sets the prototypeCellValue property, and then (if the new value is non-null), computes the fixedCellWidth and fixedCellHeight properties by requesting the cell renderer component for the given value (and index 0) from the cell renderer, and using that component's preferred size.
trans-unit.target: 设置 prototypeCellValue 属性，然后（如果新值 non-null ），通过从单元格渲染器请求单元格渲染器组件给定值（和索引0），并使用该组件的首选大小，来计算 fixedCellWidth 和 fixedCellHeight 属性。 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the rolloverEnabled property, which must be true for rollover effects to occur.
trans-unit.target: 设置 rolloverEnabled 属性，该属性必须为 true 才能发生翻转效果。

trans-unit.source: Sets the rolloverEnabled property, which must be true for rollover effects to occur. The default value for the rolloverEnabled property is false. Some look and feels might not implement rollover effects; they will ignore this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 rolloverEnabled 属性，该属性必须为 true 才能发生翻转效果。 rolloverEnabled 属性的默认值为 false 。某些外观可能无法实现翻转效果。他们将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.target: 设置此 JInternalFrame 的 rootPane 属性。此方法由构造函数调用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the rootPane property.
